entry.title: Qa engineer
entry.text:
#–≤–∞–∫–∞–Ω—Å–∏—è #QA #X–µ–ª—å—Å–∏–Ω–∫–∏ #fulltime #relocation 

Who? Senior Software Engineer in Test 
Where? Toughbyte (recruitment agency), Helsinki, Finland üá´üáÆ
Salary: up to 5000 EUR gross/month

Our client is a cloud technology startup launched in January 2016, developing Database-as-a-Service. They run and manage Open Source database and backend messaging systems for the business customers around the world. They take the pain away from running databases and allow the customers to focus on building their own products without worrying about database management. 
Right now the company is looking for a self-driven Senior Software Engineer in Testing to join their team in Helsinki. You‚Äôll be part of a team working on the cloud platform, further extending the test automation and test infrastructure and focusing on more complicated scenarios, like performance testing and upgrade tests. Depending on your interests, you can also take ownership not just of the test automation vision but also of the overall quality and risk levels of the service.

üîπMust-have skills:
‚Ä¢Strong background in software engineering and test automation
‚Ä¢Excellent development skills in Python (pytest)
‚Ä¢Keen interest in test automation
‚Ä¢Experience on using Linux in development
‚Ä¢Fluency in English, verbal and written

üîπNice-to-have skills:
‚Ä¢Hands-on experience with some of the following systems: Apache Kafka, Apache Cassandra, PostgreSQL, MySQL and Elasticsearch
‚Ä¢Experience and interest on infrastructure as code
‚Ä¢Good understanding of security (software, networking)

Interested? üîπApply here: https://www.toughbyte.com/positions/finland/helsinki/senior-software-engineer-in-testing-803
or alina.tagirova@toughbyte.com
